item.description:
Doors open around noon. We'll go until 5:30 or 6--you're welcome to arrive and department whenever you like.

Swap theme #1: Mother Nature

Swap theme #2: Cards based on the acrylic paint demonstration demonstrated at the April Meetup.

Swap theme #3: Artist's choice! Anything goes to mark our fifth anniversary!

See Liz's note below for an explanation of the demo she'll be doing.

Can you bring something for our potluck lunch? Please sign up on the Message Board (use the "Discussions" tab above, then go to the Message Board and look for the "potluck lunch" thread).

We'll have some other surprises and activities as well.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter near the back of the building, through the door off the parking lot

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ May 2012 monthly Meetup--it's our FIFTH anniversary!
